overview: Nano Technology executive with proven success in growing technology based companies through managing technology innovation and targeted business development of market opportunities. Diverse and multi-faceted experience in both strategy development and execution including budgeting, product and process development and commercialization, capital planning and hiring and developing key employees. Demonstrated ability to drive sales and market penetration for new technologies through rigorous market research and customer focus to understand customer needs. Visionary leader who has grown businesses from startup phase.
